## ShortcutRegistry.KeyboardShortcut interface

Interface defining a keyboard shortcut.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface KeyboardShortcut 
```

[allowCollision?](./blockly.shortcutregistry_namespace.keyboardshortcut_interface.allowcollision_propertysignature.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Value of `allowCollision` to pass to `addKeyMapping` when binding this shortcut's `.keyCodes` (if any).

N.B.: this is only used for binding keycodes at the time this shortcut is initially registered, not for any subsequent `addKeyMapping` calls that happen to reference this shortcut's name.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>
